TEXT.TITLE: BHP MINTERALS <BRKNY> MELDS UTAH INTERNATIONAL
TEXT.BODY: Broken Hill Proprietary Co Ltd said it will integrate Utah International Inc, which it bought three years ago, under a common management structure. The company said effective June 1, when Utah International Chairman Alexander Wilson retires, James Curry will become chairman and chief executive officer and a new BHP-Utah Minerals International board will be named. Curry is currently executive vice president of Utah International. BHP Petroleum (Americas) Inc, formerly part of Utah International, will become a subsidiary of BHP's renamed BHP Petroleum International, headquartered in Melbourne. Reuter
